subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|一剗|剗刷|剗削|剗卻|剗地|剗子箭|剗惡除奸|剗新|剗滅|剗草除根|剗著|剗襪|剗跡|剗除|剗革|剗馬}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In Taiwan ({{w|traditional Chinese}}) 剗 is considered as the variant form of [[剷]]. However, the official form [[剷]] is less widely used compared to 剗. In mainland China ({{w|simplified Chinese}}), 剗 is simplified to [[刬]] while [[剷]] (traditional variant of 剗) is considered a variant character of [[鏟]] that is simplified to [[铲]]. In mainland China, [[刬]]/剗 carries the meaning of [[destroy]]/[[abolish]]/[[exterminate]] while [[铲]] (derived from [[鏟]]/[[剷]]) means to [[shovel]]/[[level]] off/[[root]] up.
